Text:
Crappy nrg-images. Why would someone invite the 3-4 times the amount of data loading when a high quality rip aka mp3 or ACC (for everyone) it makes it easier and quicker for all?

I am a Mac user. Never had and never needed Nero. There are many Linux and Mac users, so why this crap with nrg? Sorry my friend, I do not mean you specifically, but generally.
Thank you hoch, I love your nrg-files ;-)
